item.title: Shell CEO Pledges to Deal With Beleaguered Chemical Business
item.description: Shell Plc’s Chief Executive Officer pledged to turn around the company’s struggling chemicals business, which he said is suffering from one of the most protracted industry-wide slumps in a long time.
